data.name: Principal Platform Engineer
data.title: Platform Engineering & Technical Leadership
content: Lead a platform squad delivering multi-region {{Go}} and {{TypeScript}} services that support 12+ customer-facing products.
Shaped an event-driven architecture backed by {{Kafka}} and {{PostgreSQL}}, reducing data latency by 70% and simplifying data contracts.
Scaled CI/CD with {{Terraform}} and {{GitHub Actions}}, cutting deployment times from hours to under 10 minutes while improving release confidence.

data.title: Logistics Platform Engineering

Introduced {{GraphQL}} and {{REST}} gateways that unified three customer apps and internal tooling without downtime.
Partnered with product and ops teams to ship routing algorithms that shaved 18% off delivery times across the network.

data.name: Lead Software Engineer
